thread.title: Blender - Doom 3 TUTORIALS, apps, tools, scripts....

post.author: kat
post.body:
ok, we're gonna need a sticky to list current known resources for use with Blender and model/assest production for D3 (and generally speaking), post links below and they'll get added

Blender3d application
http://www.blender3d.org/Download - Latest version supports 8 differnt OS platforms supported inc Windows. Linux & Mac
http://download.blender.org/release - release archive (older versions)

Blender scripts (python)
http://www.elysiun.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=8095 - elysiun forum topic listing current plugins/exporters/etc....
http://scourage.servebeer.com/programmi ... index.html - site dedicated to a number of export/import scripts & plugins
Z-Brush style modeling with Blender - script displaces vertices according to their vertex-painted color.

http://www.project-blender.onlinehome.de - Unreal Tournament i/o suit includes ASE support.
script download - Download from the site
alternative download location from PCGameMods

Blender 'plugins' (.blend files)

Blender tutorials
Creating Normal map renders in Blender - includes sample material
character animation
character animation
Step by step character creation, rigging and animation
elysiun tutorial page
creating armatures
creating mountains and terrain
UVWmapping a head
UVwmapping a head
UVWmapping using Wings3D and Blender
Basic info on the new LSCM UVW tool
Prepping models for use in Doom 3
animation - using an AVI as a keyframe template
Prepping LWO models for use

Tutorial Websites
http://www.blender3d.org/cms/Tutorials.243.0.html
http://www.blenderman.org/modules.php?name=Content
http://www.vrotvrot.com/xoom/tutorials.html
http://users.bigpond.net.au/blendage/pa ... rials.html
http://www.flyingsnail.com/blenderseven.html
http://www.elysiun.com/tutorials.php
http://www.ibiblio.org/bvidtute
http://dev.newmediaworx.com/johnnyb/bpl ... orials.htm
http://10secondclub.org/users/juicy/


Video tutorials
Blender for beginners
main page
getting started
model / material / light
animation
rendering
advanced tools
extending blender
beyond blender
misc tutorials
Video tutorial listing
Modelling a terrain object

Blender website/forums
http://www.blender3d.org
http://www.blender.org
http://www.elysiun.com/index.php
http://www.blenderwars.com/index.php

misc Blender links
http://www.cise.ufl.edu/~whw/blender/
ORB renderbump download from PCGameMods
Reference Blocks v2 - use to check size of modelled object

[EDIT]Aug 06 - thread clean u and condensing.

post.author: der_ton
post.body:
A high poly head modelling, texturing and rendering tutorial:
http://wiki.cgsociety.org/index.php/Portrait?textlink

post.author: ratty redemption
post.body: der_ton, wow that's really cool and not too difficult to understand, although putting it into practice must take a lot of skill, more then I currently have, but very inspiring to see blender being able to produce results that good

post.author: ratty redemption
post.body:
not sure if this tutorial site has been mentioned before but I found some of their vid tuts very interesting.

blender newbies

post.author: obsidian
post.body: Free online book for Blender Basics
